meta.description: Minimize the weekly wage bill for a store employing senior citizens and young adults under various constraints.

sets.name: WORKER_TYPES
sets.description: Types of workers employed by the store.

params.name: wage
params.description: Weekly wage for each type of worker.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of workers of each type employed by the store.

objective.name: min_total_wage_bill
objective.description: Minimize the total weekly wage bill for all workers.

constraints.name: wage_bill_limit
constraints.description: The total weekly wage bill must be below $30000.

constraints.name: minimum_total_workers
constraints.description: The store requires at least 50 workers in total.

constraints.name: minimum_young_adults
constraints.description: At least 10 workers must be young adults.

constraints.name: young_adults_ratio
constraints.description: The number of young adults should be at least a third of the number of senior citizens.
